item.description:
Boston / Cambridge SEO Internet Marketing Networking Group

We invite local Boston SEO, affiliate marketing and search engine marketing professionals in New England area to join us.

Location:

Robbins Library  
Mass Ave  
Arlington, MA

Agenda:

6:30pm to 7pm: Open Networking

Business Card Buffet: drop you card on the networking buffet

Food Sponsor

Brick Marketing

7pm to 7:15: 2 Min Elevator Pitch:

* Tell us about you and your business or website interest  
* Any networking goal your trying to achieve out of this meeting?

7:15 - 7:45 Speaker - Andreas Goeldi, CTO of Pixability.

Search engine optimization (SEO) and video marketing are among the top strategic priorities in 2011 for business-to-business and business-to-consumer companies. These are effective, sustainable, and affordable ways to grow qualified traffic and generate more sales.
 
So what happens when you combine a little bit of SEO knowledge with some quality video content? Your number of qualified leads will skyrocket. Google loves video - so help Google find your videos. And YouTube is the second largest search engine in the world, so getting found there is essential.
 
Video SEO is the science (and often art) of creating and organizing your videos in a way that makes search engines see them, like them, and show them to the world. Is your company buried on page 20 of search results? No one is finding it. Learn how to please search engines with video to boost your brand’s visibility.
 
Join me on 10/24/11 at Robbins Library in Arlington to discuss concrete steps we can all take to use our video content to its full potential.
Andreas Goeldi is an experienced Internet technologist and online marketing expert with a passion for film and video. Andreas has worked in online marketing since the World Wide Web's earliest days. He co-founded Namics, one of Europe's largest online marketing agencies, Germany's largest blog network Blogwerk.com, and Buzzient, a U.S.-based social media analytics startup. Andreas' passion for film and video started when he bought his first Super 8 camera at the age of nine years, and he started programming at the age of 12. Andreas holds a S.M. in Management of Technology from MIT and a M.A. in Information Management from the University of St.Gallen, Switzerland.

7:45 to 8:45 Q & A, and Open Challenge Questions

Time to get advice to help fellow internet marketers.

8:45pm The End

We look forward to seeing you all at this informal Boston search engine round table discussion!

----------------------------------  

We'd like to thank ZoomInfo with a recent donation to help support this group.

 

ZoomInfo in WalthamInvites You to a Marketing Open House & Contest on November 2nd from 5-7pm! 

Would you like to showcase your work to win $2K and possibly find your next dream marketing job? If so, we want to meet you! If you have at least 2 years of experience, are VERY tech savvy and want to take the next step in your career please Join Us. Check out the link for more info or call 781.693.7577.  http://www.zoominfo.com/business/about/careers.html
